name: Please Don't Do This
description:
We made this game to illustrate out of control behavior. Please do not try to recreate your experiences here in the real world. This is purely for fun's sake.

Click the mouse and move to steer the car. Release the mouse to look down and type. 

Drive fast. Text. Meet your inevitable fate.

Game made by the three brothers of Some Brothers Studio in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 jam.

All audio and graphics assets are original except for the skybox:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-107400

and the car model:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/car-toon-the-sport-car-with-interior-62697

Drop us a comment and let us know what you think!
